verses.verse: And after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was walking <S%G4043><s%> in Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> for He was unwilling <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2309><s%> to walk <S%G4043><s%> in Judea, <S%G2453><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> were seeking <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> Him.
Now <S%G1161><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> the Feast <S%G4634><s%> of Booths, <S%G4634><s%> was at hand. <S%G1451><s%>

His brothers <S%G80><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Depart <S%G3327><s%> from here, <S%G1782><s%> and go <S%G5217><s%> into Judea, <S%G2453><s%> that Your disciples <S%G3101><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may behold <S%G2334><s%> Your works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> You are doing. <S%G4160><s%>

"For no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> in secret, <S%G2927><s%> when <S%G2532><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> to be [known] publicly. <S%G3954><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> You do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> show <S%G5319><s%> Yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the world. <S%G2889><s%>"
For not even <S%G3761><s%> His brothers <S%G80><s%> were believing <S%G4100><s%> in Him.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "My time <S%G2540><s%> is not yet <S%G3768><s%> at hand, <S%G3918><s%> but your time <S%G2540><s%> is always <S%G3842><s%> opportune. <S%G2092><s%>

"The world <S%G2889><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> hate <S%G3404><s%> you; but it hates <S%G3404><s%> Me because <S%G3754><s%> I testify <S%G3140><s%> of it, that its deeds <S%G2041><s%> are evil. <S%G4190><s%>

"Go <S%G305><s%> up to the feast <S%G1859><s%> yourselves; <S%G4771><s%> I do not go <S%G305><s%> up to this <S%G3778><s%> feast <S%G1859><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> My time <S%G2540><s%> has not yet <S%G3768><s%> fully <S%G4137><s%> come. <S%G4137><s%>"
And having said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> to them, He stayed <S%G3306><s%> in Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

But when <S%G5613><s%> His brothers <S%G80><s%> had gone <S%G305><s%> up to the feast, <S%G1859><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> He Himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up, not publicly, <S%G5320><s%> but as it were, in secret. <S%G2927><s%>
The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> were seeking <S%G2212><s%> Him at the feast, <S%G1859><s%> and were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> is He?"

And there was much <S%G4183><s%> grumbling <S%G1112><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him; some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He is a good <S%G18><s%> man <S%G18><s%>"; others <S%G243><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "No, <S%G3756><s%> on the contrary, <S%G235><s%> He leads <S%G4105><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> astray. <S%G4105><s%>"
Yet <S%G3305><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> was speaking <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> of Him for fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews. <S%G2453><s%>
But when it was now <S%G2235><s%> the midst <S%G3322><s%> of the feast <S%G1859><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up into the temple, <S%G2413><s%> and [began to] teach. <S%G1321><s%>

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> were marveling, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> has this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> become <S%G3609><s%> learned, <S%G3609><s%> having never <S%G3361><s%> been educated <S%G3129><s%>?"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "My teaching <S%G1322><s%> is not Mine, <S%G1699><s%> but His who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.

"If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> is willing <S%G2309><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> His will, <S%G2307><s%> he shall know <S%G1097><s%> of the teaching, <S%G1322><s%> whether <S%G4220><s%> it is of God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> [whether] I speak <S%G2980><s%> from Myself. <S%G1683><s%>

"He who speaks <S%G2980><s%> from himself <S%G1438><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> glory; <S%G1391><s%> but He who is seeking <S%G2212><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the One who sent <S%G3992><s%> Him, He is true, <S%G227><s%> and there is no <S%G3756><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> in Him.

" Did not Moses <S%G3475><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> you the Law, <S%G3551><s%> and [yet] none <S%G3762><s%> of you carries <S%G4160><s%> out the Law <S%G3551><s%>? Why <S%G5101><s%> do you seek <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> Me?"
The multitude <S%G3793><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "You have <S%G2192><s%> a demon! <S%G1140><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> You?"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I did <S%G4160><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> deed, <S%G2041><s%> and you all <S%G3956><s%> marvel. <S%G2296><s%>

"On this <S%G3778><s%> account <S%G1223><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> you circumcision <S%G4061><s%> (not because <S%G3754><s%> it is from Moses, <S%G3475><s%> but from the fathers <S%G3962><s%>), and on [the] Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> you circumcise <S%G4059><s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

"If <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> on [the] Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> that the Law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> may not be broken, <S%G3089><s%> are you angry <S%G5520><s%> with Me because <S%G3754><s%> I made <S%G4160><s%> an entire <S%G3650><s%> man <S%G444><s%> well <S%G5199><s%> on [the] Sabbath <S%G4521><s%>?
"Do not judge <S%G2919><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to appearance, <S%G3799><s%> but judge <S%G2919><s%> with righteous <S%G1342><s%> judgment. <S%G2920><s%>"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the people <S%G2415><s%> of Jerusalem <S%G2415><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Is this <S%G3778><s%> not the man whom <S%G3739><s%> they are seeking <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%>?

"And look, <S%G2396><s%> He is speaking <S%G2980><s%> publicly, <S%G3954><s%> and they are saying <S%G3004><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to Him. The rulers <S%G758><s%> do not really <S%G230><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> do they?

"However, <S%G235><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> is from; but whenever <S%G3752><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> may come, <S%G2064><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> He is from."

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You both <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G3609><s%> Me and know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> from; and I have not come <S%G2064><s%> of Myself, <S%G1683><s%> but He who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me is true, <S%G228><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you do not know. <S%G3609><s%>
"I know <S%G3609><s%> Him; because <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> from Him, and He sent <S%G649><s%> Me."

They were seeking <S%G2212><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to seize <S%G4084><s%> Him; and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> laid <S%G1911><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> on Him, because <S%G3754><s%> His hour <S%G5610><s%> had not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

But many <S%G4183><s%> of the multitude <S%G3793><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in Him; and they were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "When <S%G3752><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall come, <S%G2064><s%> He will not perform <S%G2038><s%> more <S%G4183><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> than those which <S%G3739><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> has, will He?"

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> muttering <S%G1111><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Him; and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> to seize <S%G4084><s%> Him.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "For a little <S%G3398><s%> while <S%G5550><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> with you, then <S%G2532><s%> I go <S%G5217><s%> to Him who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.
"You shall seek <S%G2212><s%> Me, and shall not find <S%G2147><s%> Me; and where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to one <S%G1438><s%> another, <S%G1438><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> does this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> intend <S%G3195><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> that we shall not find <S%G2147><s%> Him? He is not intending <S%G3195><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> to the Dispersion <S%G1290><s%> among the Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> and teach <S%G1321><s%> the Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> is He?

"What <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> statement <S%G3056><s%> that He said, <S%G3004><s%> 'You will seek <S%G2212><s%> Me, and will not find <S%G2147><s%> Me; and where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%>'?"

Now <S%G1161><s%> on the last <S%G2078><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> [day] of the feast, <S%G1859><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and cried <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> is thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> let him come <S%G2064><s%> to Me and drink. <S%G4095><s%>

"He who believes <S%G4100><s%> in Me, as the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> 'From his innermost <S%G2836><s%> being <S%G2836><s%> shall flow <S%G4482><s%> rivers <S%G4215><s%> of living <S%G2198><s%> water. <S%G5204><s%>'"

But this <S%G3778><s%> He spoke <S%G3004><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who believed <S%G4100><s%> in Him were to receive; <S%G2983><s%> for the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> was not yet <S%G3768><s%> [given,] because <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was not yet <S%G3764><s%> glorified. <S%G1392><s%>

[Some] of the multitude <S%G3793><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> certainly <S%G230><s%> is the Prophet. <S%G4396><s%>"

Others <S%G243><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>" Still others <S%G3588><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Surely <S%G3361><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> is not going to come <S%G2064><s%> from Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> is He?

"Has not the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> that the Christ <S%G5547><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> from the offspring <S%G4690><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> and from Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> David <S%G7035><s%> was?"
So <S%G3767><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a division <S%G4978><s%> in the multitude <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of Him.
And some <S%G5100><s%> of them wanted <S%G2309><s%> to seize <S%G4084><s%> Him, but no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on Him.

The officers <S%G5257><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and they said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not bring <S%G71><s%> Him?"
The officers <S%G5257><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "Never <S%G3763><s%> did a man <S%G444><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> the way <S%G3779><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> man <S%G444><s%> speaks. <S%G2980><s%>"
The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, "You have not also <S%G2532><s%> been led <S%G4105><s%> astray, <S%G4105><s%> have you?
"No <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of the rulers <S%G758><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> has believed <S%G4100><s%> in Him, has he?
"But this <S%G3778><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> which does not know <S%G1097><s%> the Law <S%G3551><s%> is accursed. <S%G7074><s%>"
Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them (he who came <S%G2064><s%> to Him before, <S%G4387><s%> being <S%G1510><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them),

"Our Law <S%G3551><s%> does not judge <S%G2919><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> it first <S%G4413><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> from him and knows <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> he is doing, <S%G4160><s%> does it?"

They answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "You are not also <S%G2532><s%> from Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> are you? Search, <S%G2045><s%> and see <S%G3708><s%> that no <S%G3756><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> arises <S%G1453><s%> out of Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>"
[And everyone <S%G1538><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to his home. <S%G3624><s%>
